sys_one_extend_capability.description: The Determine Case Classification from Email Interaction (DCCEI) skill automatically analyzes a specific type of interaction record—one where the source is an email—to accurately identify and determine the precise support case category and sub-category. This classification uses the email's content (subject line, body text, and context of any attachments within the record) to initiate the correct workflow and ensure accurate routing.
sys_one_extend_capability.name: Determine Case Classification from Email
sys_one_extend_capability.short_description: Determine Case Classification from Email Interaction (DCCEI)
